refnamediv.refpurpose: Validate a document in using a DTD, a Relax NG or a Schema.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Validate a document with a DTD, a Relax NG or a Schema. To know if a document is valid or not, you just have to put the xmlValidate in a try...catch statement.
